snippet.title: The Coma: Cutting Class - Demo Play (w/Commentary)
snippet.description:
(This is 12 mins of demo play with director's commentary.)

We just had our debut game, The Coma, Greenlit on Steam. It’s a 2D adventure game centered around Korean-horror. 

In this video, I’ll show off a bit of gameplay. I hope you enjoy what you see!

Our website: http://www.devespressogames.com 

Yaesol's Facebook Page - This mysterious Korean girl shares her thoughts on the game: 
http://www.facebook.com/gamethecoma 

Devespresso Games Facebook Page: http://www.facebook.com/devespresso 

Twitter - The lead artist discusses the game's development: http://twitter.com/Zaquard 

Instagram - Want to see some screenshots and concept art? Check this out: http://instagram.com/devespresso/ 

For more information about The Coma, read our press-kit: http://zaquardkim.wix.com/devespressogames#!thecoma-press-kit/c1t6i
